// GENERATED CODE - PLEASE DO NOT EDIT
package ${packageName};

public final class ${className}Async${genericTypes} implements ${interfaceFullName} {

    private final java.util.WeakHashMap<Object, java.util.HashMap<String, Object>> mMutexMap;

    private final ${classFullName} mWrapped;

    public ${className}Async(final ${classFullName} wrapped,
            java.util.WeakHashMap<Object, java.util.HashMap<String, Object>> mutexMap) {

        if (wrapped == null) {

            throw new NullPointerException();
        }

        if (mutexMap == null) {

            throw new NullPointerException();
        }

        mWrapped = wrapped;
        mMutexMap = mutexMap;
        ${routineFieldsInit}
    }

    private Object getMutex(final String lockId) {

        synchronized (mMutexMap) {

            final Object wrapped = mWrapped;
            java.util.HashMap<String, Object> mutexMap = mMutexMap.get(wrapped);

            if (mutexMap == null) {

                mutexMap = new java.util.HashMap<String, Object>();
                mMutexMap.put(wrapped, mutexMap);
            }

            Object mutex = mutexMap.get(lockId);

            if (mutex == null) {

                mutex = new Object();
                mutexMap.put(lockId, mutex);
            }

            return mutex;
        }
    }
